        public void sortByPoints()
        This method is being used to sort the drivers after each race according to the points they have been awarded.

      • sortByTime

        public void sortByTime()
        This method is being used to sort the driver after each race accoridng to their time for the race. Driver with the least time to complete the race is given the highest rank.

      • useSkills

        public void useSkills(int lap)
        This method is being used to assign different skills to each driver during each lap, which gives them a random time reduction aswell, which generated using a random number genertor. "overtaking" skill is only being assigned on every third lap.
        Parameters:
        lap - is being used here to assign the skills to drivers during each lap.
